name: Lithuanian Confederation of Industrialists
goal: The main goals of LPK are to create the most favourable conditions for economic, technical and social progress of Lithuanian enterprises, to present the rights of members and defend their interests in the governmental, social and international structures, improve export and import conditions in order to enable Lithuanian industry to contribute properly to the strengthening of economy.
interests: Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Foreign affairs and security policy, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: Trade, Energy and Climate, Education, Transport, EU Single Market, Environment, Digital Single Market, Industrial policy, Labour relations.
